thread.title: Nice place with some great window views.. and close to World Trade plaza
thread.title_full: Nice place with some great window views.. and close to World Trade plaza - Review of W New York - Downtown, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Clrhoney1
title: Nice place with some great window views.. and close to World Trade plaza
text:
The hotel was extremely clean and very nice contemporary room with lots of room. Navigating up to check-in then through another bank of elevators to your room through a very noisy and busy lounge/lobby is awkward at best but manageable.
Room Tip: Facing new world trade tower is unbelievable view See more room tips Green Features: Room was quiet and offers service when requested area around it a bit sketchy so pick up your drug store need before returning to your room
